data.title: RAY CHARLES CELEBRATES A GOSPEL CHRISTMAS WITH THE VOICES OF JUBILATION
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Made-for-TV programme or made-for-video/DVD release.   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   "Nothing gonna stop me"; "Angels keep watching over me"; "What kind of man"; "Oh, happy day" by Don Howard Koplow, Nancy Binns Reed; "Voices of Jubilation"; "Total praise"; "Spirit"; "From a distance"; "Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer" by Johnny Marks; "Hark the herald angels sing"; "America, America". (Songs).   Ray Charles, keyboards, vocal; The Voices of Jubilation Choir; Harold Dudley, Cynthia Roberson, Don Corey Washington, Breea Williams, voc soloists; Allan Cherry, keyboards; Michael Westbrooks, organ; Kevin Parker, acoustic double bass; Corey Washington, drums. (Personnel On Camera).   Recorded at The Resch Center, Green Bay, Wisconsin.   Motion Picture (Form).
